CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1954, pg. 23 reads: "Dapper Dan Celebrities - Shown above are some of the hundreds of sports celebrities who attended the eighteenth annual Dapper Dan Sports Banquet at the William Penn Hotel last Sunday. From left to right: Fletcher Johnson and Si Green, Duquesne University basketball stars; Sam Jethroe, Pittsburgh Pirates outfielder; J.C. Caroline, All-America halfback at Illinois; Joe Louis, former heavyweight champion; Dick Ricketts and Jim Tucker, two more standouts with the unbeaten Dukes.  Also on hand was Jackie Robinson of the Brooklyn Dodgers. - Harris Photo."Related image also published with same cutline in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1954, pg. 25.
TitMainTitle: Athletes, front row from left: Fletcher Johnson, Sam Jethroe shaking hand of Mayor David L. Lawrence with Joe Louis in between them, Dick Ricketts, Jim Tucker; back row: Sihugo "Si" Green, and J. C. Caroline, gathered in William Penn Hotel for Dapper Dan banquet
